title: card.io Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description:
Can be used to override the Notecard's I2C address from its default of 0x17
and change behaviors of the onboard LED and USB port.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

i2c.description: The alternate address to use for I2C communication. Pass -1 to reset to the default address

mode.description: Set to '-usb' to disable the Notecard's USB port. Re-enable the USB port with 'usb' or '+usb'. Set to '+busy' for LED on when Notecard is awake, and off when asleep. Set to '-busy' to reset to default. Set to 'i2c-master-disable' to disable Notecard acting as an I2C master
